text:
Ordered beef steak take away, found out that meat was still raw inside. Went back to check with store owner but they were unapologetic and rude, kept insisting that it's already fully cooked, before admitting that it wasn't fully cooked due to "take away & preventing meat to be overcooked". No need to be so hostile, just accept the feedback and move on man. Photo attached as proof.

Texture of the Beef doesn't taste like beef at all, too much baking soda making it over tenderized, never had a beef steak that taste this bad. Definitely better western food around in lorong 7 & lorong 8.

Only S$6.50 chicken cutlet meal
Coleslaw very nice üëçüëçüëç

Ordered the hot plate black pepper chicken chop and grilled fish. Both were really good! Will definitely come back again- nice neighborhood western shop. Good that they have the queue ticketing system so you can sit and wait after ordering.

Brown sauce of theirs is one of the best, grilled meat are tender and soft (ain't dry).

Highly underrated Western food store and one of the best amongst the 3 hawker centre nearby!
Chicken Chop. I asked for lesser fries more caslaw. Nice portion cheap and good. Be prepared to queue for at least half an hour for your food.
